name: Hide or Spook
description:
Made within 10 days for the "Scream Jam 2020" Your goal as a visitor is to survive against the ghost by hiding and collecting coins to disable their abilities.

Gathering the three coins will unlock an ability to stop the ghosts from using their abilities for a set period, this can help you escape and prolong your life to meet the timer and win the game. THE GHOST ABILITIES Z = Locking all doors X = Turn out all the lights F = Basic Attack | Scare a visitor Space = Dash Attack | Phase through walls and go a little fast in a dash animation
THE VISITOR ABILITIES Find 3 coins around the map | This will allow you to press Q to deactive the ghosts power and respawn them back where they originally spawned. Credits:

Programmers: Dbgamerstarz | Halfs2020 | Mikey
